mapper.select: select permission_value from acl_permission where type = 2 and is_deleted = 0

select p.permission_value from acl_user_role ur inner join acl_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join acl_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and p.type = 2 and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0

select p.id,p.pid,p.name,p.type,p.permission_value,path, p.component,p.icon,p.status,p.is_deleted,p.gmt_create,p.gmt_modified from acl_user_role ur inner join acl_role_permission rp on rp.role_id = ur.role_id inner join acl_permission p on p.id = rp.permission_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0
